channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, October 17, 2025: Rates have dropped since last October

item.description: The Trump administration is making Luigi Mangione “a pawn to further its political agenda," his attorneys argued.

item.title: WATCH: Trump announces deal to reduce cost of some IVF medications
item.description: President DonaldTrump announces a deal with a prescription fertility drug company to reduce the cost of some IVF medications.

item.title: On is sued over running shoe's allegedly "loud, embarrassing" squeak
item.description: Customers filed a class action lawsuit over the trendy running shoes that allegedly emit squeaky noises with each step.

item.title: Home equity loan vs. credit card: Which is better now that the Fed's cutting rates?
item.description: Don't instinctively swipe your credit card now when a home equity loan could be a better way to borrow. Here's why.

item.title: Renowned journalist's car explodes minutes after his daughter walks by
item.description: The blast destroyed the car, damaged another family car next to it, and damaged the front gate of Sigfrido Ranucci's home.

item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: How Trump’s approval shifted after the ceasefire in Gaza, according to a new AP-NORC poll
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll finds that more U.S. adults support President Donald Trump’s handling of the conflict in Israel after he brokered a ceasefire deal ...

item.title: King Charles, Pope Leo will pray together in historic step
item.description: The visit was scheduled for April but was postponed after Pope Francis' final illness​, shortly before his death.
